name: Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat on a bench holding two dumbbells at chest level with palms facing forward
Press the dumbbells up until your arms are fully extended
Lower the dumbbells back down to chest level in a controlled manner
Keep your feet flat on the floor and maintain a slight arch in your lower back

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline
Sit on bench with dumbbells at shoulder level
Press dumbbells straight up until arms are extended
Lower back down to shoulder level with control

name: Decline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to 15-30 degree decline and secure feet
Hold dumbbells at chest level with palms forward
Press dumbbells up until arms are fully extended
Lower back down to chest level in controlled motion

name: Dumbbell Flyes
instructions: Lie flat on bench with dumbbells extended above chest
Lower dumbbells in wide arc to sides until chest stretch is felt
Keep slight bend in elbows throughout movement
Bring dumbbells back up in same arc to starting position

name: Close-Grip Dumbbell Press
instructions: Lie flat on bench with dumbbells touching at chest level
Keep dumbbells close together throughout movement
Press up until arms are fully extended
Lower back down maintaining narrow grip position

name: Push-ups (Wide Grip)
instructions: Start in plank position with hands wider than shoulder-width
Lower body until chest nearly touches floor
Keep core tight and body in straight line
Push back up to starting position

name: Dips (Chest Variation)
instructions: Grip parallel bars and support body weight
Lean torso forward about 30 degrees
Lower body by bending elbows until stretch in chest
Push back up to starting position

name: Plank
instructions: Start in forearm plank position with elbows under shoulders
Keep body in straight line from head to heels
Engage core and squeeze glutes
Hold position for specified time

name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on side with forearm on ground, elbow under shoulder
Stack feet and lift hips off ground
Keep body in straight line from head to feet
Hold position, then repeat on other side

name: Hanging Leg Raises
instructions: Hang from pull-up bar with arms fully extended
Keep legs straight and raise them up toward chest
Lift until legs are parallel to ground or higher
Lower legs back down with control

name: Bicycle Crunches
instructions: Lie on back with hands behind head
Bring right elbow to left knee while extending right leg
Switch sides in pedaling motion
Keep core engaged throughout movement

name: Russian Twists
instructions: Sit on floor with knees bent and feet elevated
Hold dumbbell with both hands at chest
Rotate torso to right, bringing weight beside hip
Rotate to left side, alternating in controlled manner

name: Dead Bug
instructions: Lie on back with arms extended toward ceiling
Bring knees to 90-degree angle
Lower right arm and left leg simultaneously
Return to start and repeat with opposite limbs

name: Pull-ups (Wide Grip)
instructions: Hang from bar with hands wider than shoulder-width, palms forward
Pull body up until chin is above bar
Keep core engaged and avoid swinging
Lower back down with control

name: Chin-ups
instructions: Hang from bar with hands shoulder-width apart, palms facing you
Pull body up until chin clears bar
Squeeze shoulder blades together at top
Lower body back down with control

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
instructions: Place one knee and hand on bench for support
Hold dumbbell in opposite hand with arm extended
Pull dumbbell up to hip, keeping elbow close to body
Lower back down with control, repeat on other side

name: Bent-Over Dumbbell Row
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding dumbbells
Hinge at hips, keeping back flat at 45-degree angle
Pull dumbbells to sides of torso, squeezing shoulder blades
Lower dumbbells back down with control

name: Reverse Dumbbell Flyes
instructions: Sit on edge of bench, bend forward at waist
Hold dumbbells with arms hanging down, slight bend in elbows
Raise dumbbells out to sides in wide arc
Lower back down with control

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit on bench with back support, dumbbells at shoulder level
Press dumbbells overhead until arms are fully extended
Keep core engaged and avoid arching lower back
Lower back down to shoulder level with control

name: Lateral Raises
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, slight bend in elbows
Raise dumbbells out to sides until arms are parallel to floor
Lead with elbows, not hands
Lower back down with control

name: Front Raises
instructions: Stand with dumbbells in front of thighs
Raise dumbbells forward and up until shoulder height
Keep arms straight with slight bend in elbows
Lower back down with control

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Sit with dumbbells at shoulder level, palms facing you
Press up while rotating palms to face forward
Extend arms fully overhead
Reverse motion, rotating palms back toward you as you lower

name: Rear Delt Flyes (Standing)
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bend forward at waist
Hold dumbbells with arms hanging down
Raise dumbbells out to sides, squeezing shoulder blades
Lower back down with control

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms facing forward
Curl dumbbells up toward shoulders
Keep elbows stationary at sides
Lower back down with control

name: Hammer Curls
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms facing each other
Curl dumbbells up keeping palms facing inward
Keep elbows stationary at sides
Lower back down with control

name: Concentration Curls
instructions: Sit on bench, rest elbow against inner thigh
Hold dumbbell with arm fully extended
Curl weight up toward shoulder
Lower back down with control, repeat on other arm

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Stand or sit with dumbbell held overhead with both hands
Lower dumbbell behind head by bending elbows
Keep upper arms stationary and close to head
Extend arms back to starting position

name: Tricep Kickbacks
instructions: Bend forward at waist with dumbbells in hands
Keep upper arms parallel to torso, elbows bent at 90 degrees
Extend forearms back until arms are straight
Return to starting position with control

name: Diamond Push-ups
instructions: Start in plank position with hands together forming diamond shape
Keep elbows close to body
Lower body until chest nearly touches hands
Push back up to starting position

name: Goblet Squats
instructions: Hold dumbbell vertically at chest level with both hands
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Lower body into squat position, keeping chest up
Drive through heels to return to starting position

name: Bulgarian Split Squats
instructions: Place rear foot on bench behind you
Hold dumbbells at sides
Lower body until front thigh is parallel to ground
Drive through front heel to return to starting position

name: Dumbbell Lunges
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides
Step forward with one leg, lowering hips
Lower until both knees are bent at 90 degrees
Push back to starting position and repeat with other leg

name: Romanian Deadlifts
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding dumbbells in front of thighs
Hinge at hips, pushing hips back while lowering dumbbells
Keep back flat and slight bend in knees
Drive hips forward to return to starting position

name: Dumbbell Step-ups
instructions: Stand facing bench with dumbbells at sides
Step up onto bench with one foot
Drive through heel to bring other foot up
Step back down and repeat, alternating legs

name: Calf Raises (Dumbbell)
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, feet hip-width apart
Rise up onto toes as high as possible
Hold briefly at top
Lower heels back down with control
